          performance.mark('gtm.start');
          (function (w, d, s, l, i) {
            w[l] = w[l] || [];
            w[l].push({ 'gtm.start': new Date().getTime(), event: 'gtm.js' });
            var f = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
                j = d.createElement(s),
                dl = l != 'dataLayer' ? '&l=' + l : '';
            j.async = true;
            j.src = 'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id=' + i + dl;
            j.onload = function () {
              performance.mark('gtm.end');
              performance.measure('gtm', 'gtm.start', 'gtm.end');
            };
            f.parentNode.insertBefore(j, f);
        })(window, document, 'script', 'dataLayer', 'GTM-M36RG8PT');

id=":Rl29rm:" popover="auto" data-popover-position="bottom-start" style="position-anchor:--popover-Rl29rm"></div></div><div class="author Author_root___6Bx5"><a class="Link_root__vn3ab Author_link___lVxw ellipsis Link_primary__Iq4CI Link_medium__PK_qw" data-cy="author-link" title="BlueHat Security Conference" href="https://www.slideshare.net/MSbluehat"><div class="Avatar_root__GNWHY Avatar_size-small__eoiJm"><img class="Avatar_image__Bbtll" src="https://cdn.slidesharecdn.com/profile-photo-MSbluehat-48x48.jpg?cb=1575402763" alt="BlueHat Security Conference, profile picture" decoding="sync"/></div>BlueHat Security Conference</a></div><div class="description Description_root__kt4uq Description_clamped__PaV_1"><div class="Description_wrapper__hYE9_"><p data-cy="document-description">The document presents a comprehensive analysis of targeted credential phishing threats over the past decade, detailing the evolution of attack methods and defenses. It highlights crucial developments like SMS interception, two-factor authentication vulnerabilities, and the importance of security keys and OAuth. The report outlines various actors involved in these attacks and suggests enhanced protective measures to combat ongoing threats.</p><div class="pills-list PillsList_root__2EydN"><a class="Pill_root__IqOYH" aria-label="View the featured presentations, documents and infographics in the Technology Category" href="https://www.slideshare.net/category/technology"><span class="icon data-cy="slide-container"><div class="VerticalSlideImage_root__64KSA"><img id="slide-image-0" alt="Threat Analysis Group
November 2017 - @billyleonard
10 Years of Targeted Credential Phishing
 " class="vertical-slide-image VerticalSlideImage_image__VtE4p" data-testid="vertical-slide-image" fetchpriority="high" loading="eager" srcSet="https://image.slidesharecdn.com/copyof10yearsoftargetedcredentialphishing-msftfinal-171209002251/85/BlueHat-v17-10-Years-of-Targeted-Credential-Phishing-Billy-Leonard-1-320.jpg 320w, https://image.slidesharecdn.com/copyof10yearsoftargetedcredentialphishing-msftfinal-171209002251/85/BlueHat-v17-10-Years-of-Targeted-Credential-Phishing-Billy-Leonard-1-638.jpg 638w, https://image.slidesharecdn.com/copyof10yearsoftargetedcredentialphishing-msftfinal-171209002251/75/BlueHat-v17-10-Years-of-Targeted-Credential-Phishing-Billy-Leonard-1-2048.jpg 2048w" src="https://image.slidesharecdn.com/copyof10yearsoftargetedcredentialphishing-msftfinal-171209002251/85/BlueHat-v17-10-Years-of-Targeted-Credential-Phishing-Billy-Leonard-1-320.jpg" sizes="100vw"/></div><!--$--><!--/$--></div></div><div><div id="slide2" class="VerticalSlide_root__jU_9r slide-item" style="aspect-ratio:720 / 405" data-cy="slide-container"><div class="VerticalSlideImage_root__64KSA"><img id="slide-image-1" alt="Threat Analysis Group
Billy Leonard
Threat Analysis Group
 " class="vertical-slide-image VerticalSlideImage_image__VtE4p" data-testid="vertical-slide-image" fetchpriority="auto" loading="lazy" srcSet="https://image.slidesharecdn.com/copyof10yearsoftargetedcredentialphishing-msftfinal-171209002251/85/BlueHat-v17-10-Years-of-Targeted-Credential-Phishing-Billy-Leonard-2-320.jpg 320w, https://image.slidesharecdn.com/copyof10yearsoftargetedcredentialphishing-msftfinal-171209002251/85/BlueHat-v17-10-Years-of-Targeted-Credential-Phishing-Billy-Leonard-2-638.jpg 638w, https://image.slidesharecdn.com/copyof10yearsoftargetedcredentialphishing-msftfinal-171209002251/75/BlueHat-v17-10-Years-of-Targeted-Credential-Phishing-Billy-Leonard-2-2048.jpg 2048w" src="https://image.slidesharecdn.com/copyof10yearsoftargetedcredentialphishing-msftfinal-171209002251/85/BlueHat-v17-10-Years-of-Targeted-Credential-Phishing-Billy-Leonard-2-320.jpg" sizes="100vw"/></div><!--$--><!--/$--></div></div><div><div id="slide3" class="VerticalSlide_root__jU_9r slide-item" style="aspect-ratio:720 / 405" data-cy="slide-container"><div class="VerticalSlideImage_root__64KSA"><img id="slide-image-2" alt="Threat Analysis Group
But first, ….
 " class="vertical-slide-image VerticalSlideImage_image__VtE4p" data-testid="vertical-slide-image" fetchpriority="auto" loading="lazy" srcSet="https://image.slidesharecdn.com/copyof10yearsoftargetedcredentialphishing-msftfinal-171209002251/85/BlueHat-v17-10-Years-of-Targeted-Credential-Phishing-Billy-Leonard-3-320.jpg 320w, https://image.slidesharecdn.com/copyof10yearsoftargetedcredentialphishing-msftfinal-171209002251/85/BlueHat-v17-10-Years-of-Targeted-Credential-Phishing-Billy-Leonard-3-638.jpg 638w, https://image.slidesharecdn.com/copyof10yearsoftargetedcredentialphishing-msftfinal-171209002251/75/BlueHat-v17-10-Years-of-Targeted-Credential-Phishing-Billy-Leonard-3-2048.jpg 2048w" src="https://image.slidesharecdn.com/copyof10yearsoftargetedcredentialphishing-msftfinal-171209002251/85/BlueHat-v17-10-Years-of-Targeted-Credential-Phishing-Billy-Leonard-3-320.jpg" sizes="100vw"/></div><!--$--><!--/$--></div></div><div><div id="slide4" class="VerticalSlide_root__jU_9r slide-item" style="aspect-ratio:720 / 405" data-cy="slide-container"><div class="VerticalSlideImage_root__64KSA"><img id="slide-image-3" alt="Threat Analysis Group
What we don&#x27;t see in targeted phishing.
 " class="vertical-slide-image VerticalSlideImage_image__VtE4p" data-testid="vertical-slide-image" fetchpriority="auto" loading="lazy" srcSet="https://image.slidesharecdn.com/copyof10yearsoftargetedcredentialphishing-msftfinal-171209002251/85/BlueHat-v17-10-Years-of-Targeted-Credential-Phishing-Billy-Leonard-4-320.jpg 320w, https://image.slidesharecdn.com/copyof10yearsoftargetedcredentialphishing-msftfinal-171209002251/85/BlueHat-v17-10-Years-of-Targeted-Credential-Phishing-Billy-Leonard-4-638.jpg 638w, https://image.slidesharecdn.com/copyof10yearsoftargetedcredentialphishing-msftfinal-171209002251/75/BlueHat-v17-10-Years-of-Targeted-Credential-Phishing-Billy-Leonard-4-2048.jpg 2048w" src="https://image.slidesharecdn.com/copyof10yearsoftargetedcredentialphishing-msftfinal-171209002251/85/BlueHat-v17-10-Years-of-Targeted-Credential-Phishing-Billy-Leonard-4-320.jpg" sizes="100vw"/></div><!--$--><!--/$--></div></div><div><div id="slide5" class="VerticalSlide_root__jU_9r slide-item" style="aspect-ratio:720 / 405" data-cy="slide-container"><div class="VerticalSlideImage_root__64KSA"><img id="slide-image-4" alt="Threat Analysis Group
 " class="vertical-slide-image VerticalSlideImage_image__VtE4p" data-testid="vertical-slide-image" fetchpriority="auto" loading="lazy" srcSet="https://image.slidesharecdn.com/copyof10yearsoftargetedcredentialphishing-msftfinal-171209002251/85/BlueHat-v17-10-Years-of-Targeted-Credential-Phishing-Billy-Leonard-5-320.jpg 320w, https://image.slidesharecdn.com/copyof10yearsoftargetedcredentialphishing-msftfinal-171209002251/85/BlueHat-v17-10-Years-of-Targeted-Credential-Phishing-Billy-Leonard-5-638.jpg 638w, https://image.slidesharecdn.com/copyof10yearsoftargetedcredentialphishing-msftfinal-171209002251/75/BlueHat-v17-10-Years-of-Targeted-Credential-Phishing-Billy-Leonard-5-2048.jpg 2048w" src="https://image.slidesharecdn.com/copyof10yearsoftargetedcredentialphishing-msftfinal-171209002251/85/BlueHat-v17-10-Years-of-Targeted-Credential-Phishing-Billy-Leonard-5-320.jpg" sizes="100vw"/></div><!--$--><!--/$--></div></div><div><div id="slide6" class="VerticalSlide_root__jU_9r slide-item" style="aspect-ratio:720 / 405" data-cy="slide-container"><div class="VerticalSlideImage_root__64KSA"><img id="slide-image-5" alt="Threat Analysis Group
Targeted attacks are all really advanced.

The Middle Ages.

Password Alert.
 " class="vertical-slide-image VerticalSlideImage_image__VtE4p" data-testid="vertical-slide-image" fetchpriority="auto" loading="lazy" srcSet="https://image.slidesharecdn.com/copyof10yearsoftargetedcredentialphishing-msftfinal-171209002251/85/BlueHat-v17-10-Years-of-Targeted-Credential-Phishing-Billy-Leonard-19-320.jpg 320w, https://image.slidesharecdn.com/copyof10yearsoftargetedcredentialphishing-msftfinal-171209002251/85/BlueHat-v17-10-Years-of-Targeted-Credential-Phishing-Billy-Leonard-19-638.jpg 638w, https://image.slidesharecdn.com/copyof10yearsoftargetedcredentialphishing-msftfinal-171209002251/75/BlueHat-v17-10-Years-of-Targeted-Credential-Phishing-Billy-Leonard-19-2048.jpg 2048w" src="https://image.slidesharecdn.com/copyof10yearsoftargetedcredentialphishing-msftfinal-171209002251/85/BlueHat-v17-10-Years-of-Targeted-Credential-Phishing-Billy-Leonard-19-320.jpg" sizes="100vw"/></div><!--$--><!--/$--></div></div><div><div id="slide20" class="VerticalSlide_root__jU_9r slide-item" style="aspect-ratio:720 / 405" data-cy="slide-container"><div class="VerticalSlideImage_root__64KSA"><img id="slide-image-19" alt="Threat Analysis Group

Two Factor Bypass.

Lot&#x27;s of thanks ...
Threat Analysis Group
Counter Abuse Technologies
Jigsaw
SafeBrowsing
Chrome
MSTIC
Yahoo/Apple/FB Intel Teams
OGs
… and a whole cast of characters that are
Kind of a Big Deal.

| Billy Leonard </h2><div><ul class="Transcript_list__faItj"><div><li>1. <a class="Link_root__vn3ab Transcript_link__MLbGS Link_primary__Iq4CI Link_medium__PK_qw" November </a> 2017 - @billyleonard
10 Years of Targeted Credential Phishing
 </li></div><div><li>2. <a class="Link_root__vn3ab Transcript_link__MLbGS Link_primary__Iq4CI Link_medium__PK_qw" href="https://www.slideshare.net/slideshow/10-years-of-targeted-credential-phishing-billy-leonard/83684578#2">Threat Analysis Group

But </a> first, ….
 </li></div><div><li>4. <a class="Link_root__vn3ab Transcript_link__MLbGS Link_primary__Iq4CI Link_medium__PK_qw" href="https://www.slideshare.net/slideshow/10-years-of-targeted-credential-phishing-billy-leonard/83684578#4">Threat Analysis Group
What </a> we don&#x27;t see in targeted phishing.
 </li></div><div><li>5. <a class="Link_root__vn3ab Transcript_link__MLbGS Link_primary__Iq4CI Link_medium__PK_qw" href="https://www.slideshare.net/slideshow/10-years-of-targeted-credential-phishing-billy-leonard/83684578#5">Threat Analysis Group

Targeted </a> attacks are all really advanced.
 </li></div><div><li>7. <a class="Link_root__vn3ab Transcript_link__MLbGS Link_primary__Iq4CI Link_medium__PK_qw" href="https://www.slideshare.net/slideshow/10-years-of-targeted-credential-phishing-billy-leonard/83684578#7">Threat Analysis Group

The </a> Early Days.
 </li></div><div><li>10. <a class="Link_root__vn3ab Transcript_link__MLbGS Link_primary__Iq4CI Link_medium__PK_qw" href="https://www.slideshare.net/slideshow/10-years-of-targeted-credential-phishing-billy-leonard/83684578#10">Threat Analysis Group

The report is based on scan data from over 85,000 applications assessed between April 2018 and March 2019. Key findings include: (1) Most security flaws are eventually fixed but fix times have remained consistent, (2) The likelihood of flaws being fixed decreases over time leading to growing \"security debt\", (3) Frequent scanning correlated with faster fix times and lower security debt indicating the benefits of DevSecOps practices. spectrum disorder (ASD) is gender biased neurodevelopmental condition consisting of a triad of physiological symptoms. Neural images and neurobiology of cognitive disorders are complex but provide significant information and accurate visualization of developmental changes. The diagnosis is time-consuming and necessitates sufficient evidence to distinguish the disorder from other concomitant diseases. The most recent area of interest for cognitive research is neuroimaging, which is used to study the disorder's impact, affected region, and functional connectivity between the regions of interest. The challenges in the domain are the availability of data, the modalities of data, the selection of the correct processing strategies, and the result assessment complications. The study employed machine learning (ML) methods to process the autism data in both structural and functional data formats collected from the autism brain imaging data exchange (ABIDE) consortium. A comparative analysis among image processing methodologies with both data formats was successfully implemented. The variations in the processing pipeline and the outputs strongly suggest an emerging need for 3D/4D images to visualize better, accurate feature extraction and classification. algorithm","isSavedByCurrentUser":false,"pageCount":10,"score":0,"slideshowId":"282298779","sourceName":"LATEST","strippedTitle":"diabetes-mellitus-diagnosis-method-based-random-forest-with-bat-algorithm","extension":"pdf","thumbnail":"https://cdn.slidesharecdn.com/ss_thumbnails/2925142-250808021717-189b76eb-thumbnail.jpg?width=600\u0026height=600\u0026fit=bounds","description":"Diabetes mellitus (DM) is a very dangerous disease and can cause various problems. Early diagnosis of DM is essential to avoid severe effects and complications. An affordable DM diagnosis method can be developed by applying machine learning. Random forest (RF) is a machine learning technique that is applied to develop a DM diagnosis method. However, the optimization of RF hyperparameters determines the performance of RF approach. Swarm intelligence (SI) could be used to solve the hyperparameter optimization problem on RF. It is robust and simple to be applied and doesn’t require derivatives. Bat algorithm (BA) is one of SI techniques that gives a balance between exploration and exploitation to find a global optimal solution. This article proposes developing an RF-BA-based technique for diagnosing DM. The results of the experiment demonstrate that RF-BA can diagnose DM more accurately than conventional RF. RF-BA has higher performance compared to RF-particle swarm optimization (PSO) in terms of computational time. The RF-BA also are able to solve the overfitting problem in the conventional RF. In the future, the proposed method has a high chance of being implemented for helping people with early DM diagnosis with high accuracy, low cost, and high-speed process.","tags":["bat algorithm","diabetes mellitus","diagnosis"],"url":"https://www.slideshare.net/slideshow/diabetes-mellitus-diagnosis-method-based-random-forest-with-bat-algorithm/282298779","userLogin":"IAESIJAI","userName":"IAESIJAI","viewCount":110},{"algorithmId":"4","displayTitle":"VMware vSphere Foundation How to Sell Presentation-Ver1.4-2-14-2024.pptx","isSavedByCurrentUser":false,"pageCount":40,"score":0,"slideshowId":"282263387","sourceName":"LATEST","strippedTitle":"vmware-vsphere-foundation-how-to-sell-presentation-ver1-4-2-14-2024-pptx","extension":"pptx","thumbnail":"https://cdn.slidesharecdn.com/ss_thumbnails/vmwarevspherefoundationhowtosellpresentation-ver1-250806115950-68a3ac89-thumbnail.jpg?width=600\u0026height=600\u0026fit=bounds","description":"Vmware Foundation","tags":[],"url":"https://www.slideshare.net/slideshow/vmware-vsphere-foundation-how-to-sell-presentation-ver1-4-2-14-2024-pptx/282263387","userLogin":"blackmambaettijean","userName":"blackmambaettijean","viewCount":83},{"algorithmId":"4","displayTitle":"Peak of Data \u0026 AI Encore- AI for Metadata and Smarter Workflows","isSavedByCurrentUser":false,"pageCount":62,"score":0,"slideshowId":"282268330","sourceName":"LATEST","strippedTitle":"peak-of-data-ai-encore-ai-for-metadata-and-smarter-workflows","extension":"pdf","thumbnail":"https://cdn.slidesharecdn.com/ss_thumbnails/peakofdataaiencore-aiformetadataandsmarterworkflows-250806155319-8f871dbd-thumbnail.jpg?width=600\u0026height=600\u0026fit=bounds","description":"Optimizing workflows and metadata management can be time-consuming, but with AI, it's now more efficient and scalable than ever.
